mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order ( order_id, `number`, user_id, create_time, product_id, `status` ) VALUES ( #{order.order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{order.product_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
